price: 114. Wuxuu odhan: “Ma aydaan joogin adduunka in yar ma’ahee haddaad ogaan lahaydeen.
arabic: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla in labith'tum illā qalīlan law annakum kuntum taʿlamūna
